text: Jason Patric (born June 17, 1966) is an American actor. He is known for his roles in movies such as The Lost Boys, Rush, Sleepers, Geronimo: An American Legend, Your Friends & Neighbors, Narc, The Losers, The Alamo, and Speed 2: Cruise Control. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Actors from New Jersey
title: Jason Patric
